AssertionControl

public AssertionControl(boolean isCritical,
                        Filter filter)
Creates a new assertion using the default OID and the provided criticality and assertion filter.

Parameters:
isCritical - Indicates whether this control should be considered critical to the operation processing.
filter - The assertion filter.
